reviews.review_msg: One of the best profs I've had. She actually took the pandemic into consideration and let us hand assignments in until the end of the semester without any penalty. She makes her lectures very clear and is happy to provide further clarification. She'll make you work for your grade so don't skip any class material. Would highly recommend!

Amazing lecturer! She's very thorough and clear during the lectures. She tends to give a lot of readings, which you have to read otherwise it's really hard to follow the lectures. I'd definitely take another course with her!
